'Define CablePart Dim oCablePart As CablePart = Nothing 'Get unit weight Dim oCableDia As Double = oCablePart.UnitWeight

member.name: T:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper
member.summary: The class contains the general catalog data access methods which are applicable to all disciplines.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a Catalog Helper object and initializes it with the active catalog connection.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.#ctor(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.Services.SP3DConnection)
member.summary: Constructor to pass in the catalog connection explicitly.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.GetPart(System.String)
member.summary: The method returns the part given its unique part number.
member.returns: Returns the Part object.
member.exception: Raised when the part is not found.
Raised when the part number is null.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.GetPart(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the part given part class name and part number.
member.returns: Part as IPart
member.exception: Raised when part is not found.
Raised when part number is null.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.GetPartClassNames(Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.PartClassTypes)
member.summary: Returns a list of part class names for a given part class type.
member.returns: Returns as a list of string values.
member.exception: Raised when the input argument type is null.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.GetPartClass(System.String)
member.summary: Returns PartClass for the given part class name.
member.returns: Returns as a BusinessObject.
member.exception: Raised when input argument type is null.
Raised when part class is not found.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.GetNamingRules(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the read-only collection of NamingRules for a given entity class.
member.returns: Empty collection when there are no applicable name rules.
member.exception: Raised when input argument is null.
Raised when E_FAIL is returned from a COM method.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.GetInsulationPurposeList
member.summary: Returns the read-only collection of InsulationPurposeList.
member.returns: Returns as the read-only collection of codelist items.
member.exception: In case no purpose list entries found in the database.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.GetInsulationMaterials(Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.InsulationMaterialTypes)
member.summary: Returns insulation materials for the given insulation material type.
member.returns: As read-only collection of InsulationMaterial
member.exception: In case of null arguments.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogBaseHelper.GetEndGenericData(Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.PipePortProperties)
member.summary: Returns the EndGenericData for the given PipePort properties.
member.returns: Returns as PortGenericDimensions.
member.exception: Raised when no generic data is found.

member.name: T:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper
member.summary: The CatalogStructHelper class inherits CatalogBaseHelper class and implements the structure-specific APIs in addition to what CatalogBaseHelper provides.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a catalog Struct Helper object and initializes it with the active catalog connection.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.#ctor(Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.Services.SP3DConnection)
member.summary: Constructor to pass in the catalog connection explicitly.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetCrossSection(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a cross section definition object given reference standard, section type, and section name.
member.returns: returns as CrossSection
member.exception: When RefdataCrossSection is not found.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetCrossSectionTypes(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a read-only collection of cross section types given reference standard. This is an empty collection when no cross section types are found.
member.returns: Returns as list of string values.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetMaterial(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a Material object given material type and grade.
member.returns: Material
member.exception: Raised when material is not found.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetMaterials
member.summary: Returns a read-only collection of material objects.
member.returns: Empty collection when no material is found.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetMaterials(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a read-only collection of Material objects given the material type.
member.returns: Empty collection when no material is found.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetPlateDimensions(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns allowable plate dimensions given material type and grade.
member.returns: Returns as a read-only collection of Business Objects.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogStructHelper.GetPlateDimensions(Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Material)
member.summary: Returns allowable plate dimensions given a Material object.
member.returns: Returns the collection of Business Objects.

member.summary: Returns insulation materials given a material type.

member.returns: Returns as PortGenericDimensions.
member.exception: Raised when end generic data is not found.

member.summary: Returns a read-only collection of specification objects given a discipline.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogOutfittingHelper.GetSpecificationByName(Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.SpecTypes,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a business object of the specification of the given type.
member.param: Specification type defined by the enumerator (All, CableWay, Conduit, Insulation, Hvac, Piping).
the specific name of the specification.
member.returns: Returns the BusinessObject of the specification found.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogOutfittingHelper.GetSpecificationName(Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.SpecTypes,Ingr.SP3D.Common.Middle.BusinessObject)
member.summary: Get the name of a Specification object given a discipline
member.param: The type of spec such as Piping, HVAC, Cableway.
The Specification business object from which to get the name.
member.returns: Returns a string that is equal to the name.

member.name: M:Ingr.SP3D.ReferenceData.Middle.Services.CatalogOutfittingHelper.GetSpoolRule
member.summary: Get the spool rule from the catalog.
member.example:
This example shows how to get the spool rule from catalog.
'Create Catalogoutfittinghelper class object. Dim oCatalogOutfittingHlpr As New CatalogOutfittingHelper 'get the spoolrule. Dim oSpoolRule As SpoolRule = oCatalogOutfittingHlpr.GetSpoolRule()
